name: VueJs
description: Vue.js is a framework for building web applications that has a reactivity system that allows you to model and manage your application state. It is a popular choice for building user interfaces because of its simplicity and flexibility.

name: Babel
description: a JavaScript compiler that is used to convert ECMAScript 2015+ code into a backwards compatible version of JavaScript that can run on older browsers. It is often used in conjunction with Vue.js to ensure that the code is compatible with a wide range of browsers.

name: Blander
description: 3D creation software that is used for creating animations, visual effects, and video games. It is a powerful tool that is used by professionals in the film and gaming industry
